definition: designs/schemes/intentions/scheming/calculating (of a person)
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
method/technique
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
telepathy
mind reading

sentences.english: Tigeress:Oogway saw darkness in his heart and refused.
sentences.chinese: 龜大仙卻認爲他心術不正，拒絕了他。

sentences.english: The fact that there is a debate at all over whether mind-reading exists suggests that it doesn’t.
sentences.chinese: 關於讀心術是否存在的爭論表明它根本不存在。

sentences.english: One superpower all psychologists would kill for is the ability to read minds.
sentences.chinese: “讀心術”是每個心理學家都夢寐以求的超能力。

sentences.english: Or maybe you have wings or can read minds.
sentences.chinese: 或也許，你擁有一對翅膀或者會讀心術。

sentences.english: Once there was a bad monk called Liaokong. He didn't act like a monk.
sentences.chinese: 從前有個心術不正的和尚，叫做了空。
不知道，我又不會讀心術。

sentences.english: Once per day, the wielder can trigger ultrabl ast as a standard action.
sentences.chinese: 持用者每日可以以標準動作觸發一次“摧心術”。

sentences.english: Animal communication, Reiki healing and pet nanny.
sentences.chinese: 動物傳心術，靈氣治療及寵物褓姆。

sentences.english: Animal Communicators are trained in listening to animals telepathically .
sentences.chinese: 動物傳心術師是被培訓以心靈感應與動物溝通。

sentences.english: At Tinte's request, Quinlan used his psychometric abilities to read the emblem.
sentences.chinese: 按照汀苔的指示，昆蘭對紋章使用了觸物讀心術。

sentences.english: The antidote for mind reading is to examine the emotional evidence.
sentences.chinese: 矯正測心術的方法是檢查情感的證據。

sentences.english: That would mean that mind-reading would have to be the result of evolution.
sentences.chinese: 這意味着讀心術是進化的結果。

sentences.english: Many people across the centuries have claimed they could read other people’s minds.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的幾個世紀裏，很多人聲稱自己會讀心術。

sentences.english: The good animal communicator cares about animals and cares about people.
sentences.chinese: 一位好品行和道德的動物傳心術師必會關心人和動物。

sentences.english: The truly scary prospect, however, is the effect mind-reading would have on relations between the state and the individual.
sentences.chinese: 駭人的前景正式讀心術將作用與政府個人關係的結果。

definition: to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances
read-only (computing)
sequel/continuation of a book
SS or Schutzstaffel, paramilitary organization in Nazi Germany
making a deer out to be a horse (idiom); deliberate misrepresentation
The Thirty-Six Stratagems, a Chinese essay used to illustrate a series of stratagems used in politics, war, and in civil interaction/all the possible schemes and stratagems
scholars tend to disparage one another (idiom)
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
subtle words with profound meaning (idiom)
to comprehend (new things) by analogy
lit. a notch on the side of a boat to locate a sword dropped overboard (idiom); fig. an action made pointless by changed circumstances
shameful secret
firm view/definite opinion
to make an irrelevant comparison or interpretation (idiom)
to fool the world and usurp a good name (idiom)
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth
